title: Tuscan Wine and Food Escape with Florence Walking Tour
description: Embrace the laid-back lifestyle and dreamy landscape of Tuscany with a stay at Agriturismo Relais Campiglioni, ideally located within driving distance of Florence, Siena and Arezzo. Rent a car and explore the idyllic Tuscan countryside as you enjoy daily breakfast, three exclusive wine tastings in some of the area’s most renowned wineries, a complimentary bottle of wine, complimentary Wi-Fi and parking and an exciting Florence walking tour with an English speaking guide.
offer_address: 31 via di Campiglioni, Montevarchi 52025, Tuscany, Italy

title: Boutique Tuscany Vineyard Escape with Wine Tasting & Daily Breakfast
description:
Stay among the grapes and make your dreams of the Tuscan countryside a reality at this boutique stay, set on 20 hectares of verdant vineyards and olive groves. Find your slice of Italian paradise amid the lush rolling hills of Tuscany’s Chianti region. Surrounded by vineyard-cloaked valleys, Agriturismo Relais Campiglioni is a charming country house where you can escape the busy big Italian cities, but within perfect distance of all the attractions when you're ready to explore. This rustic and elegant farmhouse has two saltwater swimming pools, an outdoor jacuzzi and a sun terrace.

Wake up with daily breakfast before exploring the Tuscan countryside, or venture out to nearby Florence, Siena and Arezzo. Savour a tasting of Agriturismo Relais Campiglioni's delicious wines and olive oils, and spend the afternoon relaxing with a complimentary session in the jacuzzi.
offer_address: 31 via di Campiglioni, Montevarchi 52025, Tuscany, Italy
